parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: tone_input
parameters.description: JSON, plain text, or HTML input that contains the content to be analyzed. For JSON input, provide an object of type `ToneInput`.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The type of the input: application/json, text/plain, or text/html. A character encoding can be specified by including a `charset` parameter. For example, 'text/plain;charset=utf-8'.

parameters.name: sentences
parameters.description: Indicates whether the service is to return an analysis of each individual sentence in addition to its analysis of the full document. If `true` (the default), the service returns results for each sentence.

parameters.name: content_language
parameters.description: The language of the input text for the request: English or French. Regional variants are treated as their parent language; for example, `en-US` is interpreted as `en`. The input content must match the specified language. Do not submit content that contains both languages. You can specify any combination of languages for `content_language` and `Accept-Language`.

parameters.name: accept_language
parameters.description: The desired language of the response. For two-character arguments, regional variants are treated as their parent language; for example, `en-US` is interpreted as `en`. You can specify any combination of languages for `Content-Language` and `accept_language`.

sampleInput.tone_input: Team, I know that times are tough! Product sales have been disappointing for the past three quarters. We have a competitive product, but we need to do a better job of selling it!

sentences_tone.text: Team, I know that times are tough!
Product sales have been disappointing for the past three quarters.
We have a competitive product, but we need to do a better job of selling it!
